document.full_text: rafael nadal and roger federer have played each other 22 times on hard courts, grass and clay. now, for the first time in six years, the best rivalry in tennis is back on u.s. soil.
document.title: rafa, roger to renew rivalry in key biscayne semis
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal and roger federer have played each other 22 times on hard courts, grass and clay. now, for the first time in six years, the best rivalry in tennis is back on u.s. soil.
